SRP.Q: On Oracle Labs, what is the spatial relationship of the data point in 1988 relative to that in 1980 in terms of vertical (above/below) and horizontal (left/right) directions?
SRP.A: On Oracle Labs, the data point in 1988 is {above} and to the {right} of the data point in 1980.

SRP.A: In 1988, Aether University is {below} Nova Institute in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: What is the trend of Aether University's Publication Count levels?
VPR.A: Aether University's publication count levels show a {exponential falling} trend.

VPR.Q: What is the trend of Oracle Labs's Publication Count levels?
VPR.A: Oracle Labs's publication count levels show a {single valley} trend.

VPR.Q: What is the trend of Nova Institute's Publication Count levels?
VPR.A: Nova Institute's publication count levels show a {bimodal valley} trend.

VPR.Q: What is the trend of Crimson Foundation's Publication Count levels?
VPR.A: Crimson Foundation's publication count levels show a {single valley} trend.
